name: app-framework
description: Does all the tricky stuff for you to develop, test, build and deploy iOS and Android like web applications.

scripts.patch: npm run fix && npm version patch && node scripts/build
scripts.minor: npm run fix && npm version minor && node scripts/build
scripts.major: npm run fix && npm version major && node scripts/build
scripts.database: node scripts/prepare-firebase-database && cd demo-app && firebase login && firebase deploy --only database && cd ../ && node scripts/cleanup-firebase
scripts.storage: node scripts/prepare-firebase-storage && cd demo-app && firebase login && firebase deploy --only storage && cd ../ && node scripts/cleanup-firebase
scripts.hosting: npm run fix && node scripts/prepare-firebase-deploy && cd demo-app && firebase login && firebase deploy --only hosting && cd ../ && node scripts/cleanup-firebase
scripts.backup: node scripts/prepare-firebase-backup && cd demo-app && firebase login && firebase database:get / >database-backup.json && cd ../ && node scripts/cleanup-firebase
